ygData.subject: Re: Charm after patch
ygData.msgSnippet: There was a news post on the EQ Casters site saying the same thing. No one is getting the Charm broke message.  Must not have been turned on :( Rokenn
ygData.messageBody:
There was a news post on the EQ Casters site saying the same thing. No one
is getting the Charm broke message. Must not have been turned on :(

Rokenn



>From: "JasonF" <JasonF@...>
>Reply-To: eqbards@onelist.com
>To: "Eqbards@..." <eqbards@onelist.com>
>Subject: [eqbards] Charm after patch
>Date: Fri, 29 Oct 1999 12:39:45 -0500
>
>
>I got a tell from Cleaver on Fennin Ro last night (Hi Cleaver!) about
>Charm.
>He was naturally enough curious as to whether I'd seen a message to the
>effect that "Your charm has broken!" as was billed in the patch text. I
>had
>not, and am sure disappointed about it. Has anyone found circumstances in
>which we do receive a "charm breaks" message? Otherwise I chalk it up to a
>bug or flat-out mistake, like as the "You have gotten better at
>Swimming(71/90)" type messages that we never got.
>
>Crier Sharpsong - 28th song bard on Fennin Ro
>
>
>
>
>------------------------------------------------------------------------
>Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to toren@...
>with the subject lol.
><< text3.html >>
